articles.title: Serbia police clash with right-wing protesters at LGBTQ march - Reuters
articles.description: Police clashed with right-wing protesters on Saturday as several thousand people joined an LGBTQ march in Serbia to mark the end of EuroPride week, an event staged in a different European city each year.
articles.content: BELGRADE, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Police clashed with right-wing protesters on Saturday as several thousand people joined an LGBTQ march in Serbia to mark the end of EuroPride week, an event staged in a … [+1838 chars]

articles.title: In a first, EU moves to cut money for Hungary over damaging democracy - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union executive recommended on Sunday suspending some 7.5 billion euros in funding for Hungary over corruption, the first such case in the 27-nation bloc under a new sanction meant to better protect the rule of law.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Sept 18 (Reuters) - The European Union executive recommended on Sunday suspending some 7.5 billion euros in funding for Hungary over corruption, the first such case in the 27-nation bloc un… [+2912 chars]

articles.title: Dublin students tackle ancient geometry problem and take first place prize at EU young scientist contest - Independent.ie
articles.description: Two Irish students have scooped the first-place prize at this year’s European Union Contest for Young Scientists (EUCYS).
articles.content:
Two Irish students have scooped the first-place prize at this years European Union Contest for Young Scientists (EUCYS).
